prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon that resembles a snowman but with a fiery personality.
I want a Pokemon that combines elements of both fire and ice, showcasing a unique design.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body and fiery features, perfect for a winter setting.
Make a character that embodies both warmth and whimsy, with a vibrant color palette.
Imagine a playful fire-type Pokemon that uses its heat to melt snow around it.
Design a Pokemon that represents the duality of fire and cold, with distinct visual traits.
Show me a creature that combines a playful demeanor with fiery attacks and a friendly appearance.

distinctive_features: Flame-like crest on top of the head
